name: Square Gate
description:
What is Square Gate?

Square Gate is a 3D techno endless runner, where players must decide in a split of a second of how to change their shape to fit through never-ending gates. This is done by rotating or changing the shape and moving according to how the gate is set up. The longer you fit in the faster the game gets. Do you dare to be square?

Features
  • Easy to pick up but hard to master!
  • New mechanics compared to other endless runners, such as rotating and transforming your shape!
  • A very simple aesthetic of neon lines that help serve the player to associate the shapes with the gates by color!
  • Clean UI!
Controls MovementRotateTransformLeft/Right ArrowsUp/Down ArrowsWASD - each letter is different shape
Development

This is a solo project for me where everything was designed and made by me. Just trying out my game and leaving a rate would be greatly appreciated. As well as any feedback in the comments would also be very welcome. Thank you for viewing and have a great day!!
